maqras.text: Ojo u namedonad, ki dar on ruz on ci dar gurhost, [hama zinda va] ʙarangexta savand
Va on ci dar sinahost, [hama] oskor gardad
Jaqinan, dar on ruz Parvardigorason ʙa [vaz'u holi] eson komilan ogoh ast
[On] Furukuʙanda
[On] Furukuʙanda cist
Va tu ci doni, ki [on] furukuʙanda cist
Ruze, ki mardum monandi parvonahoi parokanda [hajronu sargardon] xohand ʙud
Va kuhho monandi pasmi rangini hallocisuda (zadasuda) xohand sud
Va ammo har kase, ki [dar on ruz] pallai mizonas sangin ʙosad
[Dar ʙihist] Dar zindagii rohatʙaxs xohad ʙud
Va ammo har kas, ki pallai mizonas saʙuk ʙosad
Pas, [maskanu] panohgohas «hovija» ast
Va tu ci doni, ki on [hovija] cist
Otase ast suzon [va su'lavar]
Zijodaxohi sumoro ʙa xud masƣul [va az jodi Parvardigor ƣofil] soxt
To [pojoni] koraton ʙa guriston rasid
Hargiz cunin nest [ki sumo mepindored]; ʙa zudi xohed donist
Boz [ham] cunin nest; ʙa zudi xohed donist
Cunin nest [ki sumo gumon mekuned]; agar ʙa donisi jaqini [va tardidnopazir haqiqati qijomatro] medonisted, [az zijodaxohi va iftixor ʙa amvolu farzandonaton dast ʙarmedosted]
Savgand, ki duzaxro xohed did
Boz ham savgand, ki onro ʙo casmi jaqin xohed did
On goh, hatman, dar ruzi qijomat az [tamomi] ne'matho ʙozxost xohed sud
Savgand ʙa asr
Ki inson dar zijon ast
Magar mu'minoni nakukore, ki jakdigarro ʙa haq suporis namudaand va ʙa sikeʙoi tavsija kardaand
Voj ʙar har ƣajʙatkunanda [va] ajʙcue
[Hamon] Kase, ki moli farovone gird ovard va onro sumoris kard
Gumon mekunad, ki molas uro covidona mesozad
Hargiz cunin nest [ki u gumon mekunad]; hatman, dar otasi darhamkuʙanda andoxta xohad sud
Va [ej Pajomʙar] tu ci medoni, ki otasi darhamkuʙanda cist
Otasi ʙarafruxtai ilohi ast
[Otase] Ki ʙar dilho cira megardad [va mesuzonad]
Be gumon, on [otas] ʙar onon furuʙasta [va az har su muhosirason karda] ast
[Afruxta] Dar sutunhoi ʙaland ast
[Ej Pajomʙar] Ojo nadidi Parvardigorat ʙo ashoʙi fil ci kard
Ojo [fireʙu] naqsai ononro dar taʙohi qaror nadod
Va parandagone guruh-guruh ʙar [sari] onon firistod
[Ki] Bo sanggil [ki dar minqoru cangol dostand] ononro sangʙoron mekardand
Pas, onhoro hamcun kohi cavidasuda soxt
Baroi [siposguzori az] hamʙastagi va unsi Qurajs
[Hamon] Hamʙastagi va unsi onon dar safarhoi zimistoni [ʙa Jaman] va toʙistoni [ʙa Som]
Bojad Parvardigori xonai Ka'ʙaro ʙiparastand
Hamon [Parvardigore], ki ononro az gurusnagi [rahonid, ʙa eson] xurok dod va az vahsatu tars emin namud
[Ej Pajomʙar] Ojo kase, ki ruzi cazoro duruƣ meangorad, didai
Pas u [hamon] kasest, ki jatimro [ʙo durusti az xud] meronad
Va [digaronro] ʙa it'omi tihidast tasviq namekunad
Pas, voj ʙar namozguzoron
Hamon kasone, ki az namozason ƣofiland
Kasone, ki xudnamoi mekunand
Va [az amonat dodani] vasoili zarurii zindagi dareƣ mevarzand
[Ej Pajomʙar] Ba rosti, ki Mo ʙa tu xajri ʙenihojat ato kardem
Pas, ʙaroi Parvardigorat namoz ʙixon va qurʙoni kun
Be tardid, dusmanat [az hamai xajrotu ʙarakot ʙeʙahra va] ʙurida ast
[Ej Pajomʙar] Bigu: «Ej kofiron
On ciro sumo meparasted, man nameparastam
Va on ciro, ki man meparastam, [niz] sumo nameparasted
Va na man parastisgari on ci sumo parastis kardaed, xoham ʙud
Va na sumo parastisgari on ci man meparastam, xohed ʙud
[Binoʙar in] Oini sumo ʙaroi xudaton va oini man ʙaroi xudam»
[Ej Pajomʙar] Hangome ki jorii Alloh taolo va piruzi faro rasad
Va mardumro ʙuʙini, ki guruh-guruh dar dini Alloh taolo doxil mesavand
Pas, ʙa citoisi Parvardigorat tasʙeh guj va az U omurzis ʙixoh; hamono U ʙisjor tavʙapazir ast
Burida ʙod har du dasti Aʙulahaʙ va halok ʙod
Molu sarvatas va on ci ʙa dast ovarda ʙud, ʙa u sude naʙaxsid
Ba zudi ʙa otasi su'lavar xohad daromad
Va hamsaras [Ummi Camil, on] hezumkas [niz voridi otas mesavad]
Bar gardanas tanoʙe az lifi xurmost
[Ej Pajomʙar] Bigu: «U Alloh taolo jaktost
Alloh taolo ʙenijoz ast [va hama nijozmandi U hastand]
Na [farzande] zoda va na zoda sudaast
Va hec kas hammonandi va hamtoi U naʙuda va nest»
[Ej Pajomʙar] Bigu: «Ba Parvardigori sapedadam panoh meʙaram
Az sarri tamomi on ci ofaridaast
Va az sarri torikii saʙ on goh ki hama coro faro girad
Va az sar [-i zanoni codugar], ki ʙo afsun dar girehho medamand
Va az sarri hasud on goh ki hasad varzad»
[Ej Pajomʙar] Bigu: «Ba Parvardigori mardum panoh meʙaram
Farmonravoi mardum
Ma'ʙudi mardum
Az sarri [sajtoni] vasvasagar, ki [ʙa hangomi zikri Alloh taolo] pinhon megardad
Hamone, ki dar dilhoi mardum vasvasa mekunad
Az cinnijon [ʙosad] va [jo az] odamijon»
